Description: Sherd from shoulder/neck of Chian pottery transport amphora; dull black band around neck, curving band below; incised inscription.
Curator's comments: For parallels, see Cambridge Museum of Classical Archaeology NA 108. The mark is commonly found on East Greek pottery.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 408)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Johnston 2006b / The Delta: From Gamma to Zeta (p.28 Table 1)
Johnston 1978 / Pottery from Naukratis: An Exhibition on the Occasion of the 11th International Congress of Classical Archaeology (no. 4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.012)
